NSW.licence_note:
NOTE: Must have 2 licences to be in this category.
1. ARC
2. Electrical contractor license or Restricted Electrical Work License

Condition - QBCC Mechanical Services licence is also required for AC jobs over $3,300.00

Can go in the Suppliers sub category without a license

QLD.licence_note:
NOTE: Must have 2 licences to be in this category.
1. ARC Licence and 
2. either VIC Plumbing (Refrigerated Air-conditioning) licence or VIC EnergySafe Electrical Contractor or D Licence
**VIC Energysafe Electrician A licence does not cover this category.

Can go in the Suppliers sub category without a license

VIC.licence_note:
NOTE: Must have 2 licences to be in this category.
1. ARC Licence and 
2. Unrestricted Electrical Licence or Restricted – Electrotechnology Systems Refrigeration and Air-Conditioning Licence.

Can go in the Suppliers sub category without a license

SA.licence_note:
NOTE: Must have 2 licences to be in this category.
1. ARC Licence
2. Electrical Contractor or Worker Licence

Can go in the Suppliers sub category without a license

WA.licence_note:
NOTE: Must have 2 licences to be in this category.
1. ARC Licence
2. Electrical Contractor Licence or Restricted Electrical Licence

Can go in the Suppliers sub category without a license

TAS.licence_note:
NOTE: Must have 2 licences to be in this category.
1. ARC Licence
2. Electrical Contractor Licence

Can go in the Suppliers sub category without a license

NT.licence_note:
Needs ARC and NSW Fair Trading Licence (Electrician or Air Conditioning or Refrigeration). Needs contractors license
Can go in the Suppliers sub category without a license

ACT.licence_note:
NOTE: Must have 2 licences to be in this category.
1. ARC Licence
2. CBS SA - Electrical Contractor Licence

Can go in the Suppliers sub category without a license

NSW.licence_note:
NOTE: Must have 2 licences to be in this category.
1. ARC
2. Electrical contractor license or Restricted Electrical Work License

Condition - QBCC Mechanical Services licence is also required for AC jobs over $3,300.00

Can go in the Suppliers sub category without a license

QLD.licence_note:
NOTE: Must have 2 licences to be in this category.
1. ARC Licence and 
2. either VIC Plumbing (Refrigerated Air-conditioning) licence or VIC EnergySafe Electrical Contractor or D Licence
**VIC Energysafe Electrician A licence does not cover this category.

Can go in the Suppliers sub category without a license

NOTE: Must have 2 licences to be in this category.
1. ARC Licence and 
2. Unrestricted Electrical Licence or Restricted – Electrotechnology Systems Refrigeration and Air-Conditioning Licence.

Can go in the Suppliers sub category without a license

NSW.licence_note: Needs either QBCC Plumbing Contractor Licence or Electrical Contractor/Restricted Electrical Licence

QLD.licence_note: Must have either VIC Plumbing (Refrigerated Air‑conditioning) or VIC EnergySafe Electrical Contractor/D Licence. **VIC Energysafe Electrician A licence does not cover this category.

VIC.licence_note: Must have either an Unrestricted Electrical Licence or Restricted – Electrotechnology Systems Refrigeration and Air‑Conditioning Licence.

SA.licence_note: Must have either an Electrical Contractor/Worker Licence or a Plumbing Contractor Licence.

WA.licence_note: Must have an Electrical Contractor Licence.

TAS.licence_note: Must have 2 licences: ARC and Electrical Contractor.

NT.licence_note: NSW Fair Trading Licence Electrical or Plumbing.

NSW.licence_note: Must have ARC and Electrical Contractor or Restricted Electrical.

QLD.licence_note: ARC plus either VIC Plumbing (Refrigerated AC) or VIC EnergySafe Electrical Contractor/D Licence.

VIC.licence_note: ARC plus Unrestricted Electrical or Restricted – Electrotechnology Systems Refrigeration & Air‑Conditioning.

WA.licence_note: ARC plus Electrical Contractor or Restricted Electrical.

NT.licence_note: ARC plus Electrician or Air Conditioning or Refrigeration licence.

QLD.licence_note: ARC plus either VIC Plumbing (Refrigerated AC) or VIC EnergySafe Electrical Contractor/D Licence.

VIC.licence_note: ARC plus Unrestricted Electrical or Restricted – Electrotechnology Systems Refrigeration & Air‑Conditioning.

WA.licence_note: ARC plus Electrical Contractor or Restricted Electrical.

NT.licence_note: ARC plus Electrician or Air Conditioning or Refrigeration licence.

QLD.licence_note: ARC plus either VIC Plumbing (Refrigerated AC) or VIC EnergySafe Electrical Contractor/D Licence.

VIC.licence_note: ARC plus Unrestricted Electrical or Restricted – Electrotechnology Systems Refrigeration & Air‑Conditioning.

WA.licence_note: ARC plus Electrical Contractor or Restricted Electrical.

NT.licence_note: ARC plus Electrician or Air Conditioning or Refrigeration licence.

QLD.licence_note: ARC plus either VIC Plumbing (Refrigerated AC) or VIC EnergySafe Electrical Contractor/D Licence.

VIC.licence_note: ARC plus Unrestricted Electrical or Restricted – Electrotechnology Systems Refrigeration & Air‑Conditioning.

WA.licence_note: ARC plus Electrical Contractor or Restricted Electrical.

NT.licence_note: ARC plus Electrician or Air Conditioning or Refrigeration licence.
